mapper.select: select s.id, s.question, s.answer, k.keywords, s.appliedcompany, to_char(s.applydate,'yyyy-mm-dd') applydate from self_introduce s left outer join (select s.id, listagg(k.keyword,',') within group(order by sid) as keywords from keyword_selfintroduce k, self_introduce s where sid = s.id and s.userid = #{userId} group by s.id) k on s.id = k.id where s.appliedcompany LIKE '%'||#{input}||'%' and s.userid = #{userId} order by s.id desc
